bow: on post baby bodies rant this morning read this article in the washington post my child is here but my body is still not my own http www washingtonpost com news parenting wp 2014 10 27 my child is here but my body is still not my own tid=sm fb saw it pop up in my facebook feed and got little excited is there really an article talking about the crazy things that happen to your body post pregnancy without any glamorization but unfortunately was wrong the article has few mentions of reality juggling groceries and baby but falls into the mom as superhero trap and actually uses that word was really hoping this was an article that presents the reality of post baby body or at least something close to it was hoping it would talk about how unlike what webmd recommends losing all of the weight six weeks after birth is possible for most people or how there are good number of us who ca lose pound while breastfeed and even gain weight despite watching our diets or how post partum depression is more than depression and includes wide variety of mood disorders or maybe how your body goes haywire when you stop breastfeeding and many people experience period of depression how even year after successful complication free emergency section still have pains in my lower stomach if roll over too quickly how having baby can completely fuck with your periods and make them debilitatingly painful even if they were pain free before how the months and months on end of sleep depravation fucks with your mood how being household with two working parents single parent or one working and one stay at home parent are all insanely stressful in their own ways how fucking maddeningly gendered children clothes and toys are or something something of substance so tired of reading articles that make motherhood into something off of pinterest and paint it to be this grand blissful became superhero experience do get me wrong my daughter is awesome and never change thing but having baby fucks up your body for very long time and it may never be the same again can we talk about the reality instead frickin men some days wake up and just want to shoot something yes when came home after my second birth my family visited me at home with my first was living across the country my older brother who is married and has kid of his own exclaimed how looked months pregnant even though had my baby few days before of course do it struck me how ignorant he was about the post birth body even though his wife had baby though in his defense maybe his wife is overweight and pregnancy and postpartum looked lot different on her than me had to explain that how looked was normal gah it is unbelievable how much pregnancy and hormones fuck up the female body you feel out of control really there is no standard embarrassed to see pictures of myself or look at myself in the mirror because of the thirty pounds that are hanging on think its important that we write things like this on public forums for other moms so you dont feel as alone gained over 50lbs during pregnancy ate well and exercised the entire time we are months post pregnancy and im down 40ishlbs but it was struggle not to mention my body is still very doughy and not at all looking like did before baby couldnt lose much of anything while breasfeeding exclusive pumper and now that im weening im having some pretty intense hormonal shifts most of the time feel like crazy person sleep gets some what better than when she was newborn but still feel like zombie about 60 of the time my daughter has lot of medical issues so the stress is higher dont have the time nor energy to be pintrest mom nor really care to be think these articles try to depict what moms want to be and play into that its shame because that doesnt really describe the majority of women and their experience post baby there is no point in comparing but people ca resist the same as when we are pregnant and get compared in behavior size and shape to every other pregnant woman also ended up with an emergency section after 36 hours of labor was super fit before and during my pregnancy kickboxed until months ran until months lifted on my due date walked 1+ hours day for the two weeks my son was past due still gained 60 lbs my body wanted red meat and milk listened to what it wanted and stressed myself out about every pound in months lost 65 lbs it was brutal to get it all off but it came off quickly in retrospect also nursed for year and for me it was impossible to count calories and feed myself and my giant baby so worked my ass off nothing had done before just had to relearn every movement after major abdominal surgery there were tears there was anger was furious with my body hated my body for failing me in so many ways that was almost years ago up to year or so after the surgery had sharp pains in the gym it was really long healing process am 38 weeks pregnant now with my second have only gained 40 lbs so far but it has been much harder to work out this time around nausea more demanding job life with toddler etc am terrified of how my body will react to losing this weight everyone at my office and in my gym tell me frequently how great was for losing all the weight so quickly last time am totally intimidated about it this time the outside pressure to bounce back is lot to handle and this time will have newborn and toddler it will not be easier by any means but somehow have set this precedent and have this reputation put on me no matter how it ends up bouncing back should be something that worry about right now should be free to prepare for the birth of my daughter and watch my son grow into big brother should be pulling my family close and getting ready to embark on this next adventure in our lives not stressing over what will be said about my body at holidays when am weeks postpartum after all no one else body is going to be topic of group conversation around the dinner table is it kinda leaves ya feeling invalidated does it really just hate everything written about pregnancy and post pregnancy only gained 20 30 lbs for both kids and both times dropped the lbs pretty effortlessly within few weeks although the last one months old now left me with some love handles that ca quite fit into most of my old pants even being on the luckier end of post pregnancy bodies it still annoys me when read or hear any about what will or should happen to body with pregnancy and after everyone is different and there just is likely scenario for anyone just tell all of my friends who are getting ready to try to not read any of that junk because it will with your head listen to your body eat healthy nap often and accept what happens thank you have been struggling to lose the baby weight finally down 10 pounds but my son is 10 months work part time my husband works full time we go for walks and bike rides but still do seem to lose anything watch what eat will admit to eating horribly every once in while just cancelled the gym membership because there are not enough hours in the day to go the staff at the gym nursery are awful when would go they would come get me out of class because my son was crying even though my son is incredibly even tempered and rarely fusses it just got to the point it was worth the packing of the diaper bag and going to the gym for maybe an hour work out get really down on myself sometimes when see other moms looking great and am still trying to lose 40pounds how do they do it also remember when was weeks post partum and my mother told asked me in front of the entire family if was still pregnant like maybe there was still another baby inside what my mother is whole other story though yes my daughter is 18 months and am still about 15 lbs over my pre pregnancy body gained ~80lb my friends occasionally commented on how still have baby belly just want to slap them do in my mind was pre eclamptic and gained ~15 lbs the last two weeks in water which gave me horrible stretch marks losing 65lbs for person is astounding in year and half but for post pardum mom there is an exception and she has to lose it all lose your baby weight fast ads just keep making moms feel horrible because everyone is different sorry for the rant rant ended your experience seems pretty close to mine wish there was way for women accept their bodies both pre and post baby or at least wish that societal messages would stop doing harm weigh slightly less now than did before the baby and my body is moderately different think that objectively stranger would say that look worse my breasts went from large to huge and saggy my butt went from lovely and round to flat and average my stomach always stuck out some but now it sticks out in squishier way like my body better now it did thing that desperately wanted it to do struggled with infertility and hated my sexy looking body hated the irony of looking so fertile when was not it socks that every mom is expected to lose the baby weight immediately some of us do still 30lbs over my prebaby weight while my best friend is wearing size smaller than her prebaby size it varies from person to person think it cool that large or small we made tiny humans while occasionally look at my tummy and get little bummed also get sense of pride that those stretch marks and extra pounds housed my little man gt like my body better now it did thing that desperately wanted it to do struggled with infertility and hated my sexy looking body hated the irony of looking so fertile when was not wow that such powerful way of phrasing that that sounds like difficult experience next time friend mentions your baby belly please slap them for me that is so not ok it been years since had my youngest son and still have lbs to go it been very hard to drop that weight have been exercising hard for the last year and half and trying to eat healthy foods less firm than was after had his brother which is sobering somehow know that fitter now though even if softer and heavier exercising is huge stress relief make sure to put that time in because deserve it after long day at work ugh amen sister also why is it treated as desirable thing to lose weight quickly that not necessarily healthy and why the fuck should woman whose body just gave life and continues to sustain it if she nurses be prioritizing getting her body back over recovery people need to stop with this getting your body back nonsense getting what back exactly our bodies are not supposed to look be the same over the course of our entire lifespan no toddler ever thinks ugh if only could get back to my original weight lbs oz how much less nursing would have to do to get back in my nb onesies it would be unhealthy and strange if our bodies *didn t* look different at different life stages and after the remarkable feat of creating an entirely new person am tuning out the media hype and anything anyone else that does make me feel great about the hard work my body is doing will always do my best to be healthy eating well staying active resting whenever possible but if my skin changes or gain weight in the process oh the fuck well trust that my body is doing what it needs to to keep me alive and no longer going to let ridiculous ideas about what should look like which are completely demonstrably insane poison the way think about myself in better shape now than before because do drink as much and eat at home more always had an athletic build and do think anyone would guess had two kids no extra skin or stretch marks but damn the breasts so saggy and soft they were always big epically for my petit frame but while breastfeeding still do look good in most tops or sweaters and all my bathing suits have to be the supportive bra type wish were brave enough to have reduction and lift when done nursing my last but do think will just want to be able to golf without squeezing my boobs with every swing or run without them going crazy and wear clothes that fit my personality instead of my breasts could have written this better also petite with large now saggy breasts and almost positive that why hate my body so much ca wear anything like because they make them for average busted people had bell palsy at the end of my pregnancy and did fully recover and all kinds of crazy shit nicu parent ppd ptsd breastfeeding everything affects your mental state and nothing really talks about it in serious way think it also comes from lack of education on exactly what happens during childbirth although we know so much about it for people who have had child yet theres whole bunch of things you never even thought were possible remember being in birthing class and thinking damn theres lot more too this then thought while myself was about months pregnant one of the most helpful things read getting ready was expect to wear your maternity pants home even if theres no baby anymore theres lot of water that takes their place and the skin still needs to go back to normal its kind of common sense but you just do think about it really and agree although it is kind of nice to be compared to superhero for just doing what you have to do there should be less focus on weight and more focus on how the mother is actually doing after childbirth mentally emotionally and physically the outside pressure is ridiculous and found that my mom was more bothered about it than anyone else so much so that she offered to pay the joining fee for the gym declined because knew never get chance to go there that was the first time round now sitting with pumpkin of belly getting ready for my second though apparently you ca tell pregnant from the back doubt it and this time round not going to stress one bit know it will take year to get back in shape know ll have crazy cravings while nursing and put on more weight know that what needed and everyone else can get lost ladies remember that to your children you are the most beautiful thing on the world especially when you smile so stop stressing and take it slowly yes was one of those freaks that lost the pregnancy weight couple weeks after had my daughter but um pre pregnancy weight is not equal to pre pregnancy body my hips will never be the same and my formerly perfect boobs are sad saggy sacks but have perfect angel baby so got that going for me at least worth it yep just resigned myself to buying some boobs when am done nursing this time around do really care about anyone else can hide what do like in clothes but ca hide from myself in the mirror there is definitely some peace and clarity the second time around know that it is possible to get to happy place for me personally after pregnancy and that it also does matter at all compared to holding new baby that is kind of hard concept to envision the first time around everyone is so focused on appearance during and right after pregnancy that it is easy to get caught up in it plus if you have never held your new baby for the first time and stared into the little face that you made it nearly impossible to imagine there was no way for me to know that all the stressing about weight and appearance did matter had no idea how powerful and important it would be to care for my own newborn child swear tell my new mom friends this like once week but go read renegade mothering she writes blog about the realities of motherhood unlike any ve read most days she speaks to my soul thank you my ass disappeared while was pregnant and it never came back what used to be nice round bottom with defined beginning and end is now flat shapeless pillow thought baby changes would just be added weight and stretch marks but my overall shape is so different now did anyone else get insane hunger pains while breastfeeding gained so much weight while nursing the hunger was literally the worst ever experienced there was no willpower usually watching what eat feels like simple deprivation but the hunger brought on by nursing felt like would die gt can we talk about the reality instead have you visited breakingmom exactly was made to feel weird because was gaining weight while breastfeeding turns out am in sizable group of women whose bodies just react that way when tried to diet my supply tanked it was between vanity and feeding my child so chose feeding my child she is 13 months still nursing and healthy as can be and while few pounds more than want to be am healthy and happy too because finally let go of worrying about my weight as far as am concerned all that superhero mom bs on pinterest does even concern me do like at it and do let it register in my mind or how about when you are the same weight as you were before pregnancy but your clothes still wo fit you this part hurts me so much as ve recently entered the working world and ca afford new wardrobe yet even if you loose the weight you can still have saggy tummy skin back down to my pre pregnancy weight but still look bit pregnant because of the skin and weird fat deposits my stretch marks took fucking years to fade away and then was pregnant again so yeah they re all back in force they also do tell you that the plan to wean at one does always go your way did plan on nursing toddler but here am my kiddo is and running jumping rope still makes me pee with no warning uncomplicated vaginal birth and all the kegels ever but still dealing with the random peeing also glad you mentioned about messed up periods just this summer ve developed mini pms and small amount of bleeding with ovulation so it like get bonus period about to start on the pill to hopefully fix this because it just awful was diagnosed as having bipolar depression years after giving birth to my twins was told biochemical changes in the brain can sometimes take years postpartum to appear enough so someone will seek treatment why does anyone ever talk about the post birth major changes in our bodies yes thankful for two wonderful kids but could have used heads up that my migraines may get exponentially worse and that instead of good old depression may start showing mania symptoms and need re evaluation and would feel less guilty if was warned to watch out for symptoms after that golden first year when we re all told to watch for symptoms of depression totally uncomplicated vaginal birth and totally textbook pregnancy have an internal scar from the stitches had so essentially had to have sex for the first time all over again to relax my body back to where it belonged before had my son we only ended up needing to wait weeks so that was bonus only weigh pounds more now than before was pregnant and my son is 18 months old have loose skin between my hips and down toward my pelvis and you can still see stretch marks going all the way up past my belly button they also come down from my boobs onto the tops of my rib cage deleted months pregnant with my second the other day was standing in the kitchen cooking eggs when peed in my pants do mean little mean they were soaked had no warning that it was about to begin and once it began there was nothing could do to stop it no matter how hard tried this is the first time this happened maybe that will go away once the kiddo pops out but part of me believes this time it wo and in for long term future of poise pads or depends still pee my pants if cough or laugh or sneeze my baby is two now they make great panty liners that absorb small leaks but damn good sneeze can soak them fast weigh less now than when first got pregnant but my body will never be the same my hips are wider my skin is looser and have that fucking mommy apron that is never despite the fact that workout like maniac and eat less than 1500 calories day going to disappear my stomach looks like crime scene and supposed to be all oh fuck it mom and have tiger stripes proud nah my body is different and not as attractive as it once was why is it such bad thing for woman to just be upset about it not celebrity who can pay for the lipo and tummy tuck on whim have to deal with my body looking like this for the rest of my life let me fucking bitch about it and be little upset ok still have to get up to pee at night two words vaginal prolapse breastfed twins the hunger insane ve never been hungrier in my life plus if we want to keep up our supply we ca eat at calorie deficit feel ripped off was told nursing would make the pounds melt away bullshit yeah felt little lied to by the pro breastfeeding crowd was also told that tooth decay came from bottle feeding at night but that nursing was safe my daughter had to get four crowns at age two despite never drinking soda or juice and always brushing twice day the dentist did tell me that it could be genetic still feel like bad parent though still glad breastfed but the hype definitely contains plenty of bullshit single parent my ex cheated while was pregnant and dumped me when our daughter was three months old have seen him since feel used and used up flabby and dumpy and tired all the time it been year and half and still struggle to not tell him how much hate him on pretty much daily basis every time make decent effort at getting in shape it gets derailed because my daughter gets sick or gets me sick or something happens at work and run out of time to run sometimes really want to date again but scared and tired and do know how to find the time the first time went online to fill out dating profile was still so beat up from the cheating that literally could think of single good thing to say about myself yup lost all my baby weight and then some but now have flap of skin that is less than attractive speaking of stretch marks hate when see people say love my stretch marks they re tiger stripes or whatever dumb shit it claims no you do love your stretch marks guarantee if you never got any you would be complaining that you had none my body is different but actually really am happier in it was constantly down on myself before for the smallest jiggle now look at my blooming blossoming daughter and my jiggle does matter in the same way maybe it because did have the perfect body to mourn but like my post baby body better lost almost hundred pounds with each pregnancy have weird endocrine problems so people got mad when gained back the weight regardless of the fact that did not change any of my habits and actually decreased my caloric intake have horrible hip pain if do sleep with memory foam wedge between my legs the after pregnancy hormones were too weird on my body and my body attacked and killed my thyroid will need supplementation for the rest of my life to function properly after my second birth had slight rectocele though kegals have helped reverse it so that do notice it as much do know that have bulges inside when press down on my core muscles lumpy floppy stomach that sags it never going away trying to make peace with it but add the pcos hair and insulin resistance regardless of low glycemic index diet and exercise and it pretty fucking ugly breasts that got bigger and never shrunk back down was hoping get reduction naturally they say that breastfeeding can make your boobs shrink they went up to cup at first and now they hover around it horrible feel like cow sleep deprivation can we talk about this it hard to sleep when kids have you on call for years and years it did bother me for the first couple years of my first child life but this second kid is killing me even though she actually sleeps far better than many children so know should complain so tired of having kids twiddling my nipples at night while nursing and waking me up with their little claws against my chest it creepy and painful but they wo stop doing it it totally genetic 30 years old with pretty average dental hygiene do floss or use mouthwash my parents did brush my teeth until was at least or and no one had heard anything about milk on teeth being bad my teeth are straight and mostly even without braces and ve never even required filling do feel bad just say no to the click bait typically fictional writer but hoping that one day through my blogging can just reach someone that there so much that people do tell you ever or they try to make you feel bad when you share it because it not their experience it crazy no kidding losing lot of weight very quickly is actually sign of poor health in many cases gained about 50lbs with my first pregnancy and lost it all plus about 35lbs extra in less than year after giving birth people complimented me constantly they told me looked great and must have been working hard shudder to think of people looking at me and thinking that kind of weight loss is normal or healthy because you know what it is lost that weight because of dangerous combination of poverty and anorexia and breastfeeding was too poor to buy food and was suffering from post partum depression that triggered the anorexic behaviour that thought recovered from several years ago and it was like started out overweight either was on the high side of normal for my height when got pregnant and when finished losing the weight after birth was back down below the border of underweight for my height but did anyone care about that nope it was just admiration and compliments we expect fucked up things from mothers so much this actually weigh less than did pre pregnancy almost 20 lbs less and my clothes still do fit my junk has traveled out of the trunk and just landed all over the damn place infuriating oh my gosh all the hugs in the world to you that sounds awful exactly the misconception that your body just goes back to normal after baby is getting really old congratulations on your *amazing* weight loss seriously wow gt ugh if only could get back to my original weight lbs oz how much less nursing would have to do to get back in my nb onesies that is so freaking funny right there thanks for the belly laugh you re total badass keep your head up your points are very well articulated seriously think you should consider writing the article you were wanting to reaf based on the responses in this thread alone think mothers are desperate to hear voice that accurately represents the post parm experience as of now it still seems to be secret society of the unheard particularly in the us which does provide adequate or mandatory paid maternity leave our stories real stories deserve no need to be heard damnit that is very tempting however job hunting right now and do want to be so public about being mother lest it hurt my chances the irony can agree with you in some ways but feel the opposite way as well have actually been really surprised how easy pregnancy was almost felt like bystander watching all of this happening like did have to do anything and my belly just kept growing and growing and out popped baby holy shit sure was extremely constipated at times gained more than should have did sleep well at the end had low platelets various other issues but overall did fine people always made me think pregnancy and child birth were pretty serious events so expected it to be pretty bad but nothing had me on bedrest or anything just some temporary discomforts really perhaps my pregnancy was easier than some other women pregnancies or perhaps am less dramatic most likely little of both and the reason people do talk about the bad stuff is because its not what you want to remember or linger on sure hate changing poop diapers but when someone says how is your daughter doing not going to respond hate changing her god damn diapers and wish weighed 40 lbs less mean there are bad aspects to parenting sure but who wants to be fixated on them guess there time and place to discuss them do find the need to linger on them often although do sympathize if friend or relative needs to vent understand that and yes being pregnant did change my body in permanent way but not so bothered by it and it is unfair that some women bounced back much faster to much better body than mine but not jealous there are probably other aspects of my life that are better than theirs and its not competition anyway we re all in this together figure my extra weight is genetically given bonus and ll just have to work little longer to get it off but hey have time so guess do believe that becoming mother is superhero experience really have enjoyed it and get venting but do think its painted as something fake and fine with infant clothes being gendered dress my daughter in tutu and ll dress my son in sweater with train on it and love it and there nothing wrong with that just dress your kids in whatever clothes you have if you want to but do hate that other people enjoy gendered clothing we re all working together to get through the challenges of motherhood hope you have other moms that you can lean on for support and can also focus on the positives because after all that all you really get out of the whole thing and its sad if you are missing the positives because they really are the best ve ever seen know you re not looking for advice but this is reddit so going to give you some anyway if were in your shoes and people complimented me on losing weight so quickly the first time would say something like you know the second one is much more difficult with an air of researched authority say it like you believe it and it might help to lower expectations of those around you even if you re not lowering them for yourself or you know you can just tell them thanks but it none of their business think there somewhere in between constantly ranting and pretending like motherhood and postpartum is skipping through valley of flowers that all looking for really regarding gendered clothing you re right it all about putting your kids in whatever you want and know that companies make things that people buy so it all based on demand but with that said it irritating that boys clothes will say little genius and the corresponding girl outfit says little princess trains and building toys are marketed for boys and dolls for girls just this weekend we went to buy night light for our daughter and found cool one that projects an image on the ceiling there was solar system in boy colors and princess castle in pink why is girls pink and princess and boys blue and smart and science it maddening we bought the solar system one fwiw and our daughter favorite toys are wooden kitchen set legos and brio trains screw gender stereotypes for real that the danger of focusing on weight instead of health this focus on thinness actually fuels some deeply unhealthy behavior hope you re well well under my pre pregnancy weight was 130 went up to 170 while pregnant and now 125 at three months post partum it took week to get down to 130 without exercising have few stretch marks on my lower stomach though my old clothes fit better now than they did before breast fed too though you re not alone understand how you feel after getting the episiotomy and sewn up referred to the mess that was down there to my lady lunch meat it really resembled ground beef more than anything recognizable you ca talk to anyone about that who is it ok to have that conversation with so yeah and hemorrhoids for life peeing every time sneeze yeah that makes me feel like superhero ugh yes ve lost all the weight thanks to chasing two crazy kids around all day long and never having time to sit or eat but shit is the same was in killer shape before and now have diastasis and what suspect is slight umbilical hernia ca even do crunch properly now it stuff like that that bothers me have numb strip inches wide where my caesarean x2 scar is and it is so freaky feeling how about the fact that husband dad gets to walk around totally unchanged physically speaking mean how unfair is that glad you finally go diagnosed and agree with you it frustrating that these things are discussed would have serious dips in mood when drop feed with my daughter looking back was definitely suffering lot my first year and some the next six months we just weaned this summer almost three years in and it was until near the end that started to feel like my previous self
